original_title: 54 Days of Consecutive Blank Sun in July...and Then - Through the Lens of Ben Riley's Snare
overview: Media: Nasa daily photographs of sun, Nasa footage of coronal explosion, photographic sound, analog recording, montaged drum score taken from a Ben Riley drum solo 1964
title: 54 Days of Consecutive Blank Sun in July...and Then - Through the Lens of Ben Riley's Snare
